Entries.default: "Someone really ought to be tending those."
"Sometimes Eothas likes to keep the candles burning in his church when no one's around. But that ain't Eothas."
"Candles lit in an abandoned temple. We saw this in Gilded Vale, too, but I doubt Eothas is keeping these flames alive."
"Looks to be a real warm welcome, cap. Like that thing hanging off Ngati's face."
"Place is deserted... but the candles keep burning...?"
